channel.title: How do I make it so you NEED runes to cast spells?
channel.description: I want to make my sever challenging so you need runes to cast spells. Does anyone have or now the tut to do that?

item.title: How do I make it so you NEED runes to cast spells?
item.dc:creator: @cc987 cc987
item.description:
@cc987 wrote:

ok i figured it out

search for the spell u want to have runes

then look around till u see

teleportToX = absX;

and paste this above it

deleteItem(runes id, getItemSlot(runes id), how many runes it takes);

ok what we just did is make it need to use runes with the spell it will also delete that amount of runes every time you use the spell

this is how to send a message to tell them they need runes
find(its in ur spell so dont press ctrl+f)

if((playerHasItemAmount

you should see something like dis

if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 0)==false)

change the numbers in the (, )
the first number is the runes and the second is the amount u need

now search for

else if((playerHasItemAmount

it will look something like dis

else if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 0)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 0)==true))

make it look like the outher one u did but this time were u see ==true leave it

not the best tut but its ok

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it so you NEED runes to cast spells?

item.title: How do I make it so you NEED runes to cast spells?
item.dc:creator: @cc987 cc987
item.description:
@cc987 wrote:

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut, post:4, topic:98003”]{ if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 3)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 3)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 1)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 3)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 3)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 1)==true)) {
just change the 556 and stuff to what rune you want ;D[/quote]

to make it simpler

hit ctrl+f find the spells name and do what he said

Read full topic
